nearly no additional computational cost.
Figure (4)
UV-Visible absorption spectra for all 10 aromatic molecules. Thick lines repre-
sent the ML spectra predicted using the 10-molecule model and computed with the ensemble
method. Thin lines represent the experimental reference.6,72–76 Dashed lines represent the
calculated spectra using the multiscale quantum chemical method.
